data.prayer: Lord, teach the young people in the state of Arua to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Arua, Uganda
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Arua.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.section_summary: On average, 4 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Arua, Uganda.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Father, help the 26,486 believers in Arua to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the state of Arua.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Nubian people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, let the threatened of Arua, Uganda know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Arua.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the state of Arua, Uganda has a population of 79,900.

We estimate Arua has 26,486 people who might know Jesus, 39,900 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 13,515 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Arua, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

location.name: Arua
